title: SARATH FONSEKA SURPRISED HOW POLITICIANS WHO NEVER HAD A GAINFUL JOB BUILDING MANSIONS TODAY
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana Speaking about the rampant corruption in the country Former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka said at a meeting at Kottawa he was often reminded of his grandfather who built a house with three rooms. His father who became a headmaster of a school also was able to build a house…
